message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.HC. 

The paper deals with image analysis and recognition in egocentric videos, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The use of lifelogging devices and the need for automatic methods for analyzing and summarizing data suggest that machine learning (cs.MM) and data mining (cs.LG) sub-categories are also relevant. The use of configurable filters and experiments with egocentric data suggest that image processing (cs.IR) is another relevant sub-category. Finally, the focus on egocentric videos suggests that human-computer interaction (cs.HC) may also be relevant.
